span.span: As per the Iowa Governor and Iowa Department of Education, GHV Schools are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
for school communication regarding COVID-19 and school closure. GHV employees, click
for leave rights under the Families First Coronavirus Response Act.

img.alt: elementary girl sitting on curb watching homecoming parade
two elementary girls sitting on the ground of the playground
student at a desk with headphones and a laptop computer
four elementary boys arm in arm in the gym watching the elementary homecoming pep rally

div.span: Garner-Hayfield-Ventura Community School District is a vibrant, student-centered school district located in north central Iowa. Our high school and elementary students attend school in Garner, while our middle school students receive their education in Ventura. About 1000 students and 150 staff members call GHV home.
To build positive relationships, inspire passion for learning, and prepare for the future
To prepare students for a successful future in a kind, caring, and compassionate way
for COVID-19 information shared by our GHV School nurses with parents on 3-12-2020.

div.div: The GHV School District is committed to ensuring that all material on our website is accessible to students, faculty, staff, and to the general public. If you experience difficulty with the accessibility of any web pages or documents, please contact bhaag@ghvschools.org to request materials in an alternate format.
